tool.name: ARTIC minion
tool.command: mkdir -p 'scheme/name/version' && #if str( $primer_scheme_source.primer_scheme_source_selector ) == "tool_data_table": ln -s '${primer_scheme_source.primer_scheme_bedfile.fields.path}' 'scheme/name/version/name.scheme.bed' && #else: ln -s '${primer_scheme_source.primer_scheme_bedfile}' 'scheme/name/version/name.scheme.bed' && #end if ln -s '${reference}' 'scheme/name/version/name.reference.fasta' && artic minion --threads \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} --normalise '${normalise}' --read-file '${input_read_file}' --scheme-directory 'scheme' --medaka #if $use_bwa: --bwa #end if 'name/version' '${input_read_file.name}'

param.name: primer_scheme_source_selector
param.label: Select a primer scheme from your history or use one from a tool data table?
param.help: Screening files must be stored in the 'primer_scheme_bedfiles' tool data table

validator.message: No primer scheme .bed files are available

tool.help:
This tool aligns MinION reads that were generated from a tiling amplicon library against a viral reference sequence. It generates a consensus fasta file and a vcf variant file.
This tool is configured to use the experimental 'medaka' variant caller.
